text:
Miss Malaysia pens sweet note to â€˜roomieâ€™ Maxine Medina INQUIRER.net / 08:20 AM February 10, 2017 A photo posted by Miss Universe Malaysia 2016 ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¾ (@kiran_jassal) on Feb 6, 2017 at 7:11pm PST ADVERTISEMENT 
In response to Maxine Medinaâ€™s heartwarming post, Miss Universe Malaysia 2016 Kiran Jassal took to social media to send her love for her â€œroomie.â€ 
On Wednesday, Jassal posted her selfie with the Filipina beauty queen on Instagram with a special message for her. â€œMissing the roomie Maxine Medina,â€ she said. â€œ24 K[arat] Magic will always hold a special place in my heart.â€ 
Likewise, Miss Universe USA Deshauna Barber also recalled her bonding times with Medina, Jassal, and Miss Universe Curacao Chanelle de Lau. 
â€œI miss my sisters,â€ she penned in the throwback post . A photo posted by Miss USA 2016 (@deshaunabarber) on Feb 7, 2017 at 3:06pm PST A photo posted by Maria Mika Maxine Medina (@maxine_medina) on Jan 18, 2017 at 1:13am PST 
Before flying to Brunei for a family outing, Medina, 26, penned a memorable shout-out to her roommate on the photo-sharing app and vowed to visit her soon. â€œIâ€™m getting emotional when I saw this in my bag as Iâ€™m really missing my roommate. Sheâ€™s the first person I always see in the morning and Iâ€™m always with when Miss Universe 2016 started,â€ she wrote. A photo posted by Maria Mika Maxine Medina (@maxine_medina) on Feb 2, 2017 at 8:39pm PST 
During the 65th Miss Universe pageant held last month at the SM Mall Of Asia Arena, Barber made it to the Top 9 cut, while Medina finished strong at the Top 6. Gianna Francesca Catolico
